serverRules.title: Be Kind and Respectful
serverRules.description: Treat everyone with kindness and respect. No harassment, hate speech, bullying, or discrimination of any kind.

serverRules.title: Keep Content Appropriate
serverRules.description: This is a safe, cozy space for all ages. No NSFW content, excessive violence, or disturbing material.

serverRules.title: No Spam or Self-Promotion
serverRules.description: Don't spam messages, links, or images. No unsolicited advertising or self-promotion without permission.

serverRules.title: Use Channels Appropriately
serverRules.description: Keep conversations in the right channels. This helps everyone find what they're looking for.

serverRules.title: Listen to Moderators
serverRules.description: When Sunny or moderators give guidance, please follow it. We're here to keep the community comfortable for everyone.
examples: Don't argue with moderation decisions in public
DM the owner if you have concerns

serverRules.title: Protect Privacy
serverRules.description: Don't share personal information about yourself or others. Keep everyone safe.
examples: No real addresses or phone numbers

serverRules.title: Have Fun and Be Yourself
serverRules.description: The Nook is your cozy corner of the internet. Relax, be authentic, and enjoy the community!

warnings.description: First-time minor violations or accidental rule breaks

minor.message: Short timeout to cool off and review rules

moderate.message: Time to step back and review community values

severe.message: Serious timeout - please review rules carefully

bans.description: Reserved for extreme violations or repeated severe issues

capsSpam.message: Hey, let's ease up on the caps lock! It's easier to read in regular text.

communityValues.description: Everyone is welcome here regardless of background, identity, or interests
We support each other and assume good intentions
Different perspectives and experiences are valued and respected
This is a safe, comfortable space where you can relax and be yourself
We encourage genuine connections and real conversations
